long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for any card in Standard play in a small window. Look up card descriptions while watching matches online without pausing the video or searching in another window. Uses the Pok√©mon TCG API (https://pokemontcg.io/)
